title: Dry Tortugas National Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets        Instagram photo by @kerryblueberry    Â    For those of you who have pets that are part of the family and travel with you - you can bring them with you to Dry Tortugas National Park.  Pets.....  are permitted on Garden Key but not inside Fort Jefferson. are not permitted on any other key in the park. must be on a leash and under physical control at all times. waste must be removed by owner from the park.
